name: Constitution
description: How durable a body is even in harsh circumstances is described by the characters constitution.

name: Strength
description: The strength of a person indicates his ability to apply physical force.

name: Agility
description: This attribute describes how well and accurate a character can control his body.

name: Reaction
description: Reaction describes the speed of reflexes and the ability of hand eye coordination.

name: Intelligence
description: Intelligence is the ability of logical thinking and analysing complex problems.

name: Education
description: This attribute measures how much knowledge an individual has collected during its lifetime.

name: Charisma
description: Voice, facial expression and body language. How a person is perceived by others which is reflected in the charisma.

name: Willpower
description: This is the mental strength of a person and its ability to withstand psychological influences.
